title: The Children's Book of Kwanzaa
description: Kwanzaa is a relatively new holiday that celebrates African American people, culture, and history. Here is a guide to all aspects of the holiday--what it is, how it came to be, its principles and symbols, and how to celebrate it. The book includes an extensive craft section with instructions on how to create the various elements used in the celebration and gifts for family and friends, as well as a recipe section with foods that children can prepare themselves for the Kwanzaa Karamu--the holiday feast. 0
author: Dolores M. Johnson
